name: Jingles the Elf
description: Jingles the Elf is a quick to knit doll for your festive decorations. Jingles’ collar uses a picot cast on, and instructions are included in the pattern. Designed by Amanda Berry @fluffandfuzz, this elf is knitted in acrylic DK yarns on single pointed needles (not in the round).
full_text: Jingles the Elf is a quick to knit doll for your festive decorations. Jingles’ collar uses a picot cast on, and instructions are included in the pattern. Designed by Amanda Berry @fluffandfuzz, this elf is knitted in acrylic DK yarns on single pointed needles (not in the round). NEEDLES A pair of 3.5mm single pointed knitting needles (US 4). RECOMMENDED YARN Paintbox Yarns Simply DK; double knitting/light worsted weight; 100% acrylic; one 100g/276m skein in each colour. NOTIONS Tapestry needle, toy filling, and 5mm black beads for eyes. SIZES One size only - 26cm tall. TECHNIQUES For confident beginners and above, other techniques used include casting on and off, knits, purls, increases and decreases, knitting stripes, and seaming to finish. PATTERN INFO This knitting pattern is a pdf download, 4 pages, and written in English. Patterns for personal use only; not for resale. Copyright © 2016 Amanda Berry; All rights reserved.
